movie.title: Anna's Storm
movie.description_intro: The mayor of a town must contend with a destructive meteor shower while searching for her missing daughter.
movie.description_full: The mayor of a town must contend with a destructive meteor shower while searching for her missing daughter.

movies.title: Teenage Yakuza
movies.summary: A high school vigilante protects his community from the extortions of mobsters from a neighboring city.
movies.description_full: A high school vigilante protects his community from the extortions of mobsters from a neighboring city.
movies.synopsis: A high school vigilante protects his community from the extortions of mobsters from a neighboring city.

movies.title: The Last Hard Men
movies.summary: In the early 20th century, some convicts while on a road gang escape and one of the convicts is Zach Provo, a half Indian, who was sent to prison during the latter part of the 19th century. He escapes with 6 others to exact vengeance on Sam Burgade the lawman who not only captured him but was also responsible for the death of Provo's wife, at least in Provo's mind. Part of his plan is to kidnap Burgade's daughter, which prompts him to strap on his guns and go after him on horseback. Can Burgade who has been retired for sometime still have what it takes to track Provo down?

movies.title: The Unity of Heroes
movies.summary: It tells the story of a generation of master Huang Feihong's calm and sagacious characteristics, and in the double worries of the provocation of Beiquan and the invasion of foreigners.
movies.description_full: It tells the story of a generation of master Huang Feihong's calm and sagacious characteristics, and in the double worries of the provocation of Beiquan and the invasion of foreigners.

movies.title: Why Him?
movies.summary: Over the holidays, Ned, an overprotective but loving dad and his family visit his daughter at Stanford, where he meets his biggest nightmare: her well-meaning but socially awkward Silicon Valley millionaire boyfriend, Laird. The rivalry develops,and Ned's panic level goes through the roof when he finds himself lost in this glamorous high-tech world and learns that Laird is about to pop the question.
